metadata.Title: soil temperature model
metadata.Extended description: Computes daily soil temperature using canopy temperature amplitude and minimum air temperature. The core routine updates a 1 cm-resolution soil temperature profile via an exponentially damped signal derived from fixed thermal diffusivity and diurnal frequency, with relaxation toward canopy temperature. The profile is aggregated to user-defined soil layers, and previous state variables (profile and canopy temperature) are updated for the next step. An initialization sets the initial profile and canopy temperature to the first-day mean air temperature.
metadata.Short description: Daily soil temperature profile and layer means computed from canopy temperatures and air temperature, with state initialization and update.
